title: Huge Ping Spikes Again
body: About a week or two ago Riot was experiencing some issues causing some of their players (myself included) to experience huge ping spikes and disconnects while in game. I suspect it's happening again since the symptoms on my side were identical today. My ping usually stays at a solid 62ms but today it was shooting up randomly sometimes as high as 2300ms+.  Please investigate this issue quickly as it makes League unplayable for me and many others.

replies.body:
I checked our records and don't see any server-related incidents from recent. Give your modem/router a quick power cycle (unplug for 60 seconds) and see if the issue continues to pop up for you.

Please let me know if your issues persist!
